name: 哈姆雷特 Hamlet
introduction: The RSC puts a modern spin on Shakespeare's Hamlet in this filmed-for-television version of their stage production. The Prince of Denmark seeks vengeance after his father is www.molikan.com murdered and his mother marries the murderer.
state: 英国 / 日本 / 美国
comments: 恩，DT这个freak把王子的疯狂表现的淋漓尽致。台词很美。
